item.title: 日本交易账户遭黑客攻击现象蔓延至中型企业
item.description: 在日本最大的证券公司为在线交易增加额外保护措施之后，犯罪分子将目标对准了日本的中型券商。【原文：Criminals have targeted mid-sized brokerages in Japan after the country’s biggest securities firms added additional protection for online trading.】

item.title: 经济担忧缓解，外资重投印尼股市
item.description: 由于经济担忧减弱以及银行股的吸引力吸引了投资者，印尼股市有望迎来 9 月份以来的首次月度资金流入。【原文：Indonesian stocks are poised for their first monthly inflow since September as subsiding economic concerns and attractive banking shares lure investors.】

item.title: 英国签证诈骗案从即将成为护理人员的人身上榨取数百万美元
item.description:
最近的移民政策变化不会对那些在英国求职时受到剥削的人有任何帮助。但它们可能会加剧护理人员短缺的问题。【原文：

Recent changes to immigration policy won’t do anything for people who’ve been exploited while seeking jobs in the UK. But they may worsen the care-worker shortage.

】

item.title: 冰激凌膨胀恰逢夏日来临
item.description:
椰子油是我们最喜爱的甜食中的一种关键成分，但它的价格却变得非常昂贵。【原文：

Coconut oil, a key ingredient in our favorite sweet treat, is becoming very expensive.  

】

item.title: 沙特人对人工智能的赌注 管道工需要更多的水管工
item.description:
如果没有足够的软件创新和人才，成为人工智能基础设施中心的庞大计划可能会泡汤。【原文：

Huge plans to become a hub for AI infrastructure could fizzle without enough software innovation and talent.

】

item.title: 马来西亚央行称已准备好在增长前景黯淡时采取行动
item.description: 马来西亚央行表示，由于美国关税使这个依赖贸易的国家前景黯淡，预计今年的经济增长将低于官方预测，因此央行拥有采取行动的政策空间。【原文：Malaysia’s central bank said it has the policy room to act as it expects economic growth to fall below the official forecast this year, with US tariffs dimming the outlook for the trade-reliant nation.】

item.title: 关税休战引发太平洋贸易热潮，促进全球托运人发展
item.description: 急于将中国商品运往美国的进口商利用关税瘫痪的短暂缓和期，为全球货运提供了急需的推动力。【原文：Importers rushing to ship Chinese goods to the US using a short reprieve from paralyzing tariffs could provide a much-needed boost to global freighters.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚的命运掌握在特朗普追随者与数学天才之间
item.description: 罗马尼亚作为欧洲项目可靠支持者的记录将在周日接受考验，因为极端民族主义者唐纳德-特朗普的弟子将与一位曾经的数学天才竞争总统职位。【原文：Romania’s track record as a reliable supporter of the European project will be put to the test Sunday as an ultranationalist Donald Trump disciple contends for the presidency against a one-time math prodigy.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴的颓势削弱了中国科技复兴的前景
item.description: 中国沉寂已久的科技行业在 2025 年伊始便一鸣惊人。【原文：China’s long-moribund tech sector started 2025 with a bang.】

item.title: 印度审查美国关于取消乙醇进口限制的请求
item.description: 印度正在审查美国提出的取消乙醇进口限制的请求，同时与华盛顿谈判更广泛的贸易协议，以避免惩罚性关税。【原文：India is reviewing a US request to lift restrictions on ethanol imports as it negotiates a wider trade deal with Washington to avoid punitive tariffs.】

item.title: 中国金矿企业赤峰在全球范围内寻找收购目标
item.description: 中国一家大型黄金生产商正在全球寻找收购机会，尽管近期全球贸易动荡导致价格波动，但该公司并不急于达成交易。【原文：A major Chinese gold producer is scouting for acquisition opportunities around the world, although the recent price volatility driven by global trade turmoil means it’s not rushing to secure deals.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚将维持利率不变，关注卢布走势
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行周五可能将维持利率不变，在政治动荡将货币推向历史低点之后，投资者正在寻找有关列伊前景的任何线索。【原文：Romania’s central bank will probably keep interest rates unchanged on Friday, with investors looking for any clues about the outlook for the leu after political turmoil pushed the currency to record lows.】

item.title: 据说中国的 BlissBio 正在考虑在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，开发癌症治疗方法的中国公司百福生物正在考虑在香港进行首次公开募股。【原文：BlissBio, a Chinese company that develops treatments for cancer, is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 液化天然气贸易商寻求增加对马来西亚和印度尼西亚的出口
item.description: 液化天然气贸易商正寻求向东南亚的传统出口国出售更多燃料，这些国家正被迫转向进口，以满足激增的能源需求。【原文：Liquefied natural gas traders are looking to sell more of the fuel to traditional exporters in Southeast Asia that are being forced to turn to imports to meet surging energy needs.】

item.title: 陷入困境的香港建筑商侨福芳草地获得 PAG 私人贷款
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，香港侨福集团已从投资公司PAG获得了一笔3亿港元（约合3800万美元）的私人信用贷款，因为银行越来越不愿意向这家资金短缺的开发商提供资金。【原文：Hong Kong’s Parkview Group has obtained a HK$300 million ($38 million) private credit loan from investment firm PAG, according to a person familiar with the matter, as banks grow reluctant to extend funds to the cash-strapped developer.】

item.title: 印度中型企业盈利增长跑赢大型企业
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 台积电供应商 GlobalWafers 将增加美国投资至 75 亿美元
item.description: 台湾芯片材料制造商环球晶圆股份有限公司（GlobalWafers Co）计划将其在美国的投资额提高到 75 亿美元，以满足美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）试图促进国内先进制造业发展而不断增长的需求。【原文：Taiwanese chip materials maker GlobalWafers Co plans to raise its investments in the US to $7.5 billion, sating increasing demand as President Donald Trump tries to boost advanced manufacturing at home.】

item.title: 随着 TikTok 的火热，ByteDance 的目标是在 2025 年与 Meta 的销售额相匹配
item.description: 尽管全球经济可能出现衰退，ByteDance Ltd. 仍将 2025 年的收入增长目标定在 20% 左右，这一扩张速度可帮助该公司与 Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：ByteDance Ltd. is targeting revenue growth of about 20% in 2025 despite a potential global economic downturn, a pace of expansion that could help it match Meta Platforms Inc.’s global business.】

item.title: 马来西亚承诺 2025 年削减汽油补贴，但没有确定日期
item.description: 马来西亚致力于在今年下半年减少汽油补贴，并在美国关税使经济前景暗淡的情况下完善其计划。【原文：Malaysia is committed to reducing petrol subsidies in the second half of the year and is refining its plan as US tariffs darken the economic outlook.】

item.title: 希尔豪斯首个私人信贷基金将募集约 7 亿美元资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，希尔豪斯投资公司（Hillhouse Investment）旗下的私人信贷部门 Elham Credit Partners 将获得 7 亿至 7.5 亿美元的锚定承诺，用于其首期私人信贷基金的首次关闭。【原文：Elham Credit Partners, the private credit arm of Hillhouse Investment, is set to get anchor commitments of $700 million to $750 million for the first close of its inaugural private credit fund, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中美贸易紧张局势缓和，百度、Bilibili、联想发布报告
item.description: 百度公司（Baidu Inc.）、Bilibili 公司（Bilibili Inc.【原文：Baidu Inc., Bilibili Inc. and Lenovo Group Ltd. are among the Chinese tech firms in focus for next week’s earnings, just as the easing US-China trade war brings back some optimism for the sector.】

item.title: 日本希望在过去对话的基础上与美国进行货币谈判
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信（Katsunobu Kato）表示，他将在上个月与美国财务大臣斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）进行对话的基础上，于下周再次寻找机会与对方讨论货币问题。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato said he’ll seek another opportunity to talk with his US counterpart Scott Bessent next week to discuss currency matters, building on their dialogue last month.】

item.title: 日本收益率飙升令决策者左右为难
item.description: 日本 7.8 万亿美元国债市场的收益率经过多年的缓慢增长后，正以惊人的速度不断走高。【原文：After years of moving at a glacial pace, yields in Japan’s $7.8 trillion government debt market are shifting higher at breakneck speed.】

item.title: 全球最大食糖贸易商下调全球食糖过剩预期
item.description: 全球最大的食糖贸易商下调了对下一榨季全球食糖过剩的预测，警告说市场低估了巴西这个最大种植国的天气和运输风险。【原文：The world’s biggest sugar trader slashed its forecast for a global surplus in the coming season, cautioning that the market was underestimating risks from weather and transportation in top grower Brazil.】

item.title: 特朗普对华关税在 2025 年末仍将维持在 30% 的水平
item.description: 分析师和投资者表示，唐纳德-特朗普对中国征收的关税很可能在90天休战期结束后仍将维持在预计会严重抑制中国对美出口的水平，这表明尽管谈判正在积极进行，但中国政府可能不得不忍受进一步的经济痛苦。【原文：Donald Trump’s tariffs on China will likely remain at a level expected to severely curtail Chinese exports to the US after the 90-day truce, analysts and investors say, suggesting Beijing may have to endure further economic pain despite active talks.】

item.title: 印度 Greenko 公司创始人希望达成新协议，从 Orix 收购股权
item.description: 印度清洁能源生产商绿科能源控股公司（Greenko Energy Holdings）的创始人仍在努力收购奥克斯公司（Orix Corp.【原文：The founders of Indian clean energy producer Greenko Energy Holdings are still working on purchasing Orix Corp.’s stake in the company, despite the Japanese financial group’s announcement cancelling the sale, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势缓解，亚洲交易员缩减降息押注
item.description: 在中美贸易摩擦出现缓和迹象后，市场预计亚洲新兴出口依赖型经济体的央行将不会采取过于激进的宽松政策。【原文：Markets are pricing in less aggressive policy easing by central banks in emerging Asia’s export-dependent economies, following signs of reduced trade frictions between the US and China.】

item.title: 日本经济在关税冲击前一年来首次出现萎缩
item.description: 日本经济一年来首次出现萎缩，这表明日本在承受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税措施的影响之前就已经十分脆弱。【原文：Japan’s economy shrank for the first time in a year, illustrating its vulnerability even before sustaining the impact of US President Donald Trump’s tariff measures.】

item.title: 伊朗潜在协议引发供应担忧，石油止跌回升
item.description: 由于美国和伊朗之间可能达成的核协议有可能加剧今年晚些时候的供应过剩，石油在连续两天下跌后持稳。【原文：Oil was steady after two days of losses as a potential nuclear deal between the US and Iran risks exacerbating a glut forecast for later this year.】

item.title: 美国数据疲软刺激降息押注，黄金收复部分失地
item.description: 本周早些时候，由于疲软的美国经济数据引发了对美联储进一步降息的押注，债券收益率下挫，黄金收复了部分惨重跌幅。【原文：Gold retraced some of the heavy losses it incurred earlier this week, after bond yields sank on weak US economic data that raised bets on further Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】
